hotelchain

Class ReservationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelchain.FileHandler
      • hotelchain.ReservationManager

  • public class ReservationManager
extends FileHandler
    Manages the Reservations made at a HotelChain. It contains information about hotels, reservations and the date. Extends the FileHandler class in order to be able to store guest registration information to a file. The variable filename may be adapted to reflect a desired file name.
    Author:
    Joost Janssen TODO Future features: room&pricing managers, check in/out, read archive if desired, better guest removal handling (w/in reservation manager instd. of its interface)..

      • reserveRoom

        protected Reservation reserveRoom(Guest resGuest,
                      Hotel resHotel,
                      java.lang.String roomType,
                      java.util.Calendar resStartDate,
                      java.util.Calendar resEndDate)
        Reserve a room for a guest at a hotel at a certain time. Returns the resulting Reservation.
        Parameters:
        resGuest - Guest reserving a room.
        resHotel - Reserved Hotel.
        roomType - Type of Room.
        resStartDate - Start date of reservation.
        resEndDate - End date of reservation.
        Returns:
        Returns the resulting reservation made. Returns null if desired reservation could not be made.

      • findReservationID

        protected java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> findReservationID(int guestID)
        Finds the ID number of the reservation made by the Guest with the given guest ID.
        Parameters:
        guestID - Guest ID number.
        Returns:
        Returns the ID number of the reservation made by the Guest with given guestID. Returns -1 if no reservation was found.

      • getPastAndCancelledReservations

        protected java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> getPastAndCancelledReservations()
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of Reservations that where either cancelled or whose end date is before the current date.

      • moveReservationsToArchive

        protected boolean moveReservationsToArchive(java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> oldReservations)
        Moves a given ArrayList of Reservations the archive by removing its Reservations from the list of current reservations. Writes archive to file.
        Parameters:
        oldReservations - ArrayList of Reservations to be moved to archive.
        Returns:
        Returns whether the given ArrayList was successfully moved to archive.
